name: Ultrazone
description:
In a harsh world, it is difficult to remain human. Take control of the soldiers to guide them and restrain the enemy forces. In this strategy, you will have soldiers under your control who are ready to follow your orders and give their lives for you. Look for new fighters to replenish your army. The enemies are very dangerous and attack in a crowd. Also on your way will be nature itself, which has filled some areas with poisonous gas. Be careful strategist, to win, you have to try!

Features of the game:
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Dangerous enemies
  • Interesting gameplay
